name: Tank Tracks
description:
Tank Tracks is a quick, simple, arcade run and gun game meant to challenge a players ability to remember stage layouts and to preform actions and manoeuvres around the courses, all in the hope of beating your previous time.

controls tank:
w/s - move forward / back
a/d - turn left / right
space - hover projectiles when you have none, fires when you do.

+ theres a debug menu if you press: =
some commands:
speed "insert number between 0, 9"
Time "insert number between 0, 9"
Time. "insert number between 0, 9"
scale "insert number between 0, 9"
scale. "insert number between 0, 9"
starfox
god
noclip
skittles
neo
420
reset/ron/ronald
and more...
